title: Smal typo in OIDC recorder
body:
### Describe the bug

If the oidc server is not available at startup, the recorder will state : 

'OIDC Server is not available'. OIDC server is not available yet, an attempt to connect will be made duiring the first request. Access to resources protected by this tenant may fail if OIDC server will not become available'

### Expected behavior

The error message should be :

'OIDC Server is not available'. OIDC server is not available yet, an attempt to connect will be made duiring the first request. Access to resources protected by this tenant may fail if OIDC server will not become available'

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

_No response_
